    • Method Detail

      • getAll

        public java.util.List<FlightEntity> getAll(int offset,
                                  int limit,
                                  java.lang.String order,
                                  java.lang.String filter)
                                    throws PersistenceException
        Get all flights or all flights by the filters
        Parameters:
        offset - offset of the flight
        limit - limit (count) of flights to get
        order - two part string: 'column:[asc|desc]'
        filter - date filter, in example: dateOfDepartureFrom=2013-02-27T02:04:46+01:00,dateOfDepartureTo=2013-02-27T03:04:46+01:00
        Returns:
        List of Flight entities
        Throws:
        PersistenceException
